Cookies! Hand pies!) at Bakeshop.ORDER : whatever you’re craving once all the aromas of butter, chocolate, and more butter hit you. There are stellar salt-topped chocolate chip cookies, super-moist lemon pound cake, and crowd favorite fig-laced buckwheat scones, if you need help narrowing your order down.THE VIBE IS: cheerful, with a big glass display of sweets greeting you as soon as you enter. Sure, it’s smart to avoid the morning rush, but make sure you double check the close time before you come in (2 p.m.!).PRACTICAL STUFF: Open Wednesday through Sunday, 7 a.m. to 2 p.m. Closed Monday and Tuesday.—Elyse InamineLeela CydWE ALSO LOVEHeartDon’t leave Portland without a bag of the city’s best beansSalt & StrawWilly Wonka + locavore + artisanal ice cream CanoeThe downtown destination design store for your kitchen, bath, and living roomExplore City GuidesAtlantaAustinBostonCharlestonChicagoCopenhagenLas VegasLondonLos AngelesMexico CityMiamiMontrealNew OrleansNew YorkParisPhiladelphiaPortlandSan FranciscoSeattleTokyoTorontoVancouverWashington, D.C.GET THE MAGAZINEBA LogoBon appetitSUBSCRIBESign up for Updates on the Bon AppétitCity GuidesSign UpWill be used in accordance with our user agreement and privacy policyBA LogoBon appetitSubscription FAQsMastheadNewsletter SignupAccessibility HelpRSS FeedsSite MapCondé Nast StoreCareersBon Appétit Media KitDo Not Sell My Personal InformationCondé NastFood Innovation Group: Bon Appétit and Epicurious© 2022 Condé Nast.
